title: Low-Waste Citrus Program Without Lab Gear
system_mod: Prioritize zero/low-waste techniques that are feasible with basic bar equipment.
venue_context: High-volume hotel lobby bar; limited back-of-house, no centrifuge. Looking to cut citrus waste and stabilize juice for 48–72 hours.
prompt: Design us a low-waste citrus program—including stabilized juice, uses for peels/pulp, and freezer batching—suitable for a high-volume lobby bar without lab equipment.
